name: Birmingham
intro: AFJ Limited has been headquartered in Birmingham since 2006. From our base in Nechells, we provide the full spectrum of specialist transport services — from transporting over 2,000 students daily to delivering CQC-rated patient transport across the city.
introSecond: We are proud to be Birmingham City Council accredited, NHS approved, and the only UK Patient Transport Service provider that builds its own ambulances in-house. Our commitment to Birmingham's communities drives everything we do.
heroImageAlt: AFJ fleet vehicles at Birmingham headquarters

name: Manchester
intro: AFJ Limited extends its trusted transport services across Greater Manchester and the wider North West region. With accreditations from Manchester City Council, Oldham, Trafford, Tameside, and Lancashire councils, we are a proven partner for school transport and patient care.
introSecond: Our CQC-rated "Good" patient transport service and council-accredited SEND transport ensure the highest standards of safety, reliability, and compassion for every passenger we serve in Manchester.
heroImageAlt: AFJ patient transport crew serving Manchester

name: Sandwell
intro: AFJ Limited is Sandwell Council accredited, providing trusted transport services across the borough including West Bromwich, Oldbury, Smethwick, Rowley Regis, Tipton, and Wednesbury. Our proximity to Sandwell — just six miles from our Birmingham base — means fast, reliable service.
introSecond: With DBS-checked staff, wheelchair-accessible vehicles, and a CQC "Good" rating for patient transport, we deliver the same high standards in Sandwell as we do across all the areas we serve.
heroImageAlt: AFJ minibuses serving the Sandwell area

name: Coventry
intro: AFJ Limited provides reliable transport services across Coventry and surrounding areas. Just 19 miles from our Birmingham headquarters, Coventry is well within our core service area for SEND school transport, patient transport, and private hire.
introSecond: Our DBS-checked drivers and passenger assistants, wheelchair-accessible fleet, and CQC-rated patient transport service ensure the highest standards of care for Coventry's communities.
heroImageAlt: AFJ minibuses available for Coventry services

name: West Midlands
intro: AFJ Limited serves the entire West Midlands region from our Birmingham headquarters. With council accreditations across multiple boroughs and a CQC "Good" rating for patient transport, we are a trusted partner for transport services from Wolverhampton to Solihull and everywhere in between.
introSecond: Our fleet of 50+ vehicles, 47+ qualified drivers, and in-house workshop, training centre, and conversion facility allow us to deliver a comprehensive range of services across the West Midlands.
heroImageAlt: AFJ garage and workshop serving the West Midlands

name: Solihull
intro: AFJ Limited provides specialist transport services across Solihull, just nine miles from our Birmingham base. With its proximity to Birmingham Airport, Solihull is a key area for our airport transfer service alongside SEND school transport and patient transport.
introSecond: Our council-accredited, DBS-checked team and wheelchair-accessible fleet ensure safe, reliable transport for students, patients, and private hire customers throughout the Solihull borough.
heroImageAlt: AFJ fleet vehicles serving Solihull

name: Walsall
intro: AFJ Limited delivers trusted transport services across Walsall, just 10 miles from our Birmingham headquarters. We provide SEND school transport, CQC-rated patient transport, and private minibus hire throughout the borough.
introSecond: With 18+ years of experience serving West Midlands communities, our DBS-checked staff and wheelchair-accessible vehicles ensure safe, compassionate transport for Walsall's students and patients.
heroImageAlt: AFJ wheelchair-accessible vehicle serving Walsall

name: Wolverhampton
intro: AFJ Limited provides specialist transport services in Wolverhampton, approximately 15 miles from our Birmingham base. We hold accreditation from Wolverhampton City Council and deliver SEND transport, patient transport, and private hire across the city.
introSecond: Our CQC-rated "Good" patient transport and council-accredited school transport services ensure the highest standards of safety and reliability for Wolverhampton's communities.
heroImageAlt: AFJ transport crew serving Wolverhampton

name: Dudley
intro: AFJ Limited serves the Dudley borough with specialist transport services, just 10 miles from our Birmingham headquarters. We provide SEND school transport, non-emergency patient transport, and private minibus hire across Dudley, Stourbridge, Halesowen, and surrounding areas.
introSecond: With DBS-checked staff, wheelchair-accessible vehicles, and a CQC "Good" rating, we deliver reliable, safe transport for Dudley's students, patients, and community groups.

intro: AFJ Limited extends its trusted transport services to Stoke-on-Trent, approximately 45 miles from our Birmingham base. We provide SEND school transport, CQC-rated patient transport, and private minibus hire across the Potteries.
introSecond: Our experienced, DBS-checked team and modern wheelchair-accessible fleet bring the same high standards of service to Stoke-on-Trent that have made us a trusted name across the West Midlands.
